body:
All,

I'm waiting for the developer of GenCumulativeSky to give me the permission to distribute his code with Ladybug. Hopefully, it shouldn't take more than couple of days to hear back from him. Other than Ladybug is ready!

I captured a video that quickly goes through the majority of the components. The speed of the video is 1.5x to keep it under 5 minutes. Check the video here.

<iframe _origwidth="560" frameborder="0" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/OEjwAyC2l_0?wmode=opaque" width="560"></iframe>




Cheers,

Mostapha

replies.body: Looks great! Looking forward to test it.

Hi Mostapha. What does the "Orientation study" do? Orients an object according to what?
Thank you.

Hi djordje... Check this discussion and let me know if you have any questions: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/orientation...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/orientation-study)

Will do Mostapha.
Love your work, and articles! Thanks man.
